title: What character do you think is in need of a new look and why

replies.body:
Akali
Cho'gath
Corki
Mundo
Evelynn
Ezreal
Gragas
Irelia
Jax
Katarina
Lee sin
Malzahar
Nunu
Pantheon
Poppy
Tristana
Warwick
Xin-zhao
Yorick
Zilean

All of those either have a really ugly in game model or splash art or both 

I dont know wether to add Taric to the list
he is my fave support and his model/artwork is in major need of a re-hawl
but being so chunky/klunky adds to his charm i think and if they do re-hawl him they are bound to make him 'Cool' and we cant have that can we, he has to remain his 'Outrageous' self
